flawed_nl_solution:
Since the company was contracted to build 4000 bollards on each side of a road, they were to install a total of 4000*2 = <<4000*2=8000>>8000 bollards on all sides of the road.
The company was only able to install 3/4*8000 = <<3/4*8000=32000/3>>32000/3 bollards on all sides of the road.
They required 8000-32000/3 = <<8000-32000/3=-8000/3>>-8000/3 more bollards to install on all sides of the remaining part of the road.
#### -8000/3

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 6000, not 32000/3. It appears the value was multiplied by the reciprocal of the intended fraction.
